title: Resource Exchange Schema
description: A schema for tracking resource exchanges between holons in the Regenerativa network

from_holon.title: From Holon
from_holon.description: The holon providing the resource (soul/ID reference)

to_holon.title: To Holon
to_holon.description: The holon receiving the resource (soul/ID reference)

optionality_increase.title: Optionality Increase
optionality_increase.description: How much this exchange increases the receiver's optionality (1-100)

lunar_cycle.title: Lunar Cycle
lunar_cycle.description: Which lunar cycle this exchange occurs in

exchange_date.title: Exchange Date
exchange_date.description: Unix timestamp of when exchange occurs/occurred

half_moon_exchange.title: Half Moon Exchange
half_moon_exchange.description: Is this part of the half-moon exchange (New Mooners â†” Full Mooners)?

regenerative_impact.title: Regenerative Impact
regenerative_impact.description: Does this exchange contribute to regeneration?

collective_need_subscribers.title: Collective Need Subscribers
collective_need_subscribers.description: Number of holons that subscribed to the need this exchange addresses

schema.name: resource_exchange-v0.1.0
schema.purpose: To track resource exchanges between holons with multi-resource accounting and optionality tracking
